subject: docs: comprehensive code review — 3 critical, 12 high, 19 medium issues
body:
Full codebase review covering scripts, React dashboard, configuration,
CI/CD, and documentation. Key findings: command injection in scripts via
execSync(), ESM/CJS mismatch preventing scripts from running, undefined
escapeHtml causing runtime crashes, and React context structure causing
excessive re-renders.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01FkGCpwdZKh3mpjJbisGYHs
title: comprehensive code review — 3 critical, 12 high, 19 medium issues
